name: TRIMIT
description:
We are a Gold Certified Partner with both the Microsoft Business Solutions, and the ISV competency.
Our goal is to extend, optimize and improve the use of Microsoft Dynamics NAV in manufacturing and trading companies. This includes a web portal solution with seamless integration to Microsoft Dynamics NAV and a complete CMS (Content Management System).
History

Since 1990 we have developed, sold and supported the TRIMIT solution for these industries,
        Wood & Furniture
        Textile & Fashion
        Iron & Metal
        Machinery & Electronics
        Plastics & Rubber
This primarily took place in Denmark in the name of CORNATOR. However, in 2008 Cornator was divided into-to two independent companies, CORNATOR and TRIMIT. Cornator continues to support the Danish market as a VAR (Value Added Reseller) and TRIMIT continues to develop state of the art functionality to the TRIMIT solutions and build an international partner strategy, focusing on the Fashion & Furniture industries.
TRIMIT has received the AA Rewarding from Soliditet -  The highest rating a trading-, limited partnership- and private company can get.
